LanguageData.MainTabWindowDescription: This tab contains lots of useful functions. Clean,boost,or even fix your current savegame here.
LanguageData.DlgTextGCAdvice1: All unnecessary WorldPawns are removed. So you don't have to press this button again(for a considerably long time!).
LanguageData.DlgTextGCAdvice2: There are still {0} WorldPawn(s) to remove. So it's highly recommended that you press this button again(to complete a thorough clean-up).
LanguageData.DlgTextGCV: RuntimeGC:Check detailed output in file output.txt
LanguageData.MsgTextAFT: RuntimeGC: {0} redundant member(s) in animal families removed.
LanguageData.MsgTextRFH: RuntimeGC: {0}sq filth removed from home area.
